perturbation.original_text:
The parties agree to modify the Agreement as follows:

1. EXTENSION OF TERM: The first paragraph of Section 4 of the Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:

  "TERM: The rights granted hereunder shall be effective as of the Effective Date and shall expire on December 31, 2006 (the "Term"); provided, however, that with respect to each Property, including Robots, Kingdom of Heaven, Mr. and Mrs. Smith, In Her Shoes, Idiocracy (Oww My Balls) and Ice Age II, all right and licenses granted herein will continue in full force and effect until March 31, 2008."
perturbation.changed_text:
The parties agree to modify the Agreement as follows:

1. NOTICE PROVISION: The first paragraph of Section 4 of the Agreement is hereby deleted in its entirety and replaced with the following:

  "TERM: The rights granted hereunder shall be effective as of the Effective Date and shall expire on December 31, 2006 (the "Term"); provided, however, that with respect to each Property, including Robots, Kingdom of Heaven, Mr. and Mrs. Smith, In Her Shoes, Idiocracy (Oww My Balls) and Ice Age II, all right and licenses granted herein will continue in full force and effect until March 31, 2008."
perturbation.explanation: The 'EXTENSION OF TERM' clause is mislabeled as a 'NOTICE PROVISION', potentially confusing a party trying to understand the contractual term.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract law principles of clarity and understanding

perturbation.original_text: Except as herein expressly amended or by necessary implication modified by this Amendment, the Agreement in all other respects is hereby ratified and shall continue in full force and effect.
